DOC.brief_summary: This study design test whether WelChol ( colesevelam HC1 ) improve blood sugar control patient type 2 diabetes make insulin work efficiently .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Colesevelam HC1 ( WelChol® ) Insulin Sensitivity Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: Single-center , randomize , parallel , double-blind , placebo control , 8-week trial subject type 2 diabetes mellitus . Two parallel treatment group include double-blind colesevelam placebo . A screening period may 18 week withdraw non sulfonylurea antidiabetic treatment withdraw adjust sulfonylurea antidiabetic treatment . To evaluate hepatic peripheral insulin sensitivity , subject undergo two-step hyperinsulinemic-euglycemic clamp tritiated glucose infusion pre randomization 8 week treatment . To evaluate oral glucose absorption , subject undergo two oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) pre randomization , one without colesevelam one colesevelam , one OGTT end treatment period..
DOC.criteria: Subjects meet follow criterion Screening Visit eligible participate trial : Have give write informed consent Ages 18 75 year , inclusive Diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus least 3 month duration HbA1C 7.0 10.0 % , inclusive Antidiabetic treatment may include oral agent ; antidiabetic agent must withdraw randomization Women may enrol pregnant ( negative serum βHCG Screening Visit ) , breastfeed , plan become pregnant trial . In addition , must either hysterectomy tubal ligation least 6 month sign informed consent , postmenopausal 1 year , practice acceptable method birth control . An acceptable method birth control may oral , injectable implantable hormonal contraceptive , intrauterine device , diaphragm plus spermicide , female condom plus spermicide .
